title: Storage Location
description: A physical location (such as a building, room, cabinet or drawer) within the holding institution where objects associated with the collection description are stored or exhibited.

locationName.description: A label used to identify a place where the collection is stored.

locationType.description: The nature of the location where the collection is stored.

address.description: One or more Addresses relating to the Storage Location

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Storage Location

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Storage Location

measurementOrFact.description: One or more Measurement Or Facts relating to the Storage Location
